title: Rads Error?

replies.body: Also tried the 8.8.8.8 8.8.4.4 method, replacing RADS_KERNEL_USER, running as administrator, changing compatibility settings (Windows XP Service 3 i think) and deleting 2 folders:'Lol launcher', 'Lol launcher air' or something. One more thing there is an windows update which will not install so that method failed 2.{{item:3070}}
Others are also experiencing this, it could be an issue on Riot's end. Wait it out a bit and see if it's fixed.

How long until u think rito will fix this?
{{item:3070}}
Considering that they haven't noticed yet, it might be quite a while.
This is stupid, i can't even play League...
